transcripts.speaker: Maya Rodriguez
transcripts.text: Morning everyone. We're 10 days out from launch. Let's go around - what's everyone working on?

transcripts.speaker: Chris Park
transcripts.text: Payment flow is about 80% done. I hit a snag with the Stripe webhook handling yesterday - their test mode was acting weird. But I figured it out, should finish today. Also, I've got the search prototype ready for review.

transcripts.speaker: Aisha Patel
transcripts.text: Settings screens are done. I'm now working on the error states and loading animations. Also, I reviewed Chris's search prototype - looks good, but I have some UI suggestions for the results display.

transcripts.speaker: Derek Nguyen
transcripts.text: Marketing page is live and getting good traffic. We're at about 600 people on the waitlist now. I'm preparing the launch email sequence and social media posts. Also need final screenshots from Aisha for the App Store listing.

transcripts.speaker: Maya Rodriguez
transcripts.text: Great progress. Aisha, can you prioritize those screenshots? App Store submission deadline is Friday. Chris, when can you have payment flow fully tested?

transcripts.speaker: Chris Park
transcripts.text: I'll finish coding today, then do full testing tomorrow. Should be ready for QA by Thursday morning.

transcripts.speaker: Aisha Patel
transcripts.text: I'll have the screenshots ready by end of day tomorrow. I'll send them to Derek directly.

transcripts.speaker: Derek Nguyen
transcripts.text: I need the final app icon from Aisha too - the one we're using is still a placeholder.

transcripts.speaker: Aisha Patel
transcripts.text: Oh right, I'll include that with the screenshots. It's basically done, just needs final polish.

transcripts.speaker: Maya Rodriguez
transcripts.text: Excellent. We're in good shape. Let's keep pushing - launch is right around the corner.
